CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Steakholder Foods Ltd is a deep-tech food company. The company is cultivating meat technologies to improve meat production, simplify the meat supply chain and offer consumers a range of new product offerings. The company aims to provide an alternative to industrialized animal farming that reduces carbon footprint, minimizes water and land usage and prevents the slaughtering of animals. It is developing a novel, proprietary three-dimensional bioprinter to deposit layers of differentiated stem cells, scaffolding, and cell nutrients in a three-dimensional form of structured cultured meat. Through modular factory design, it expects to be able to offer a sustainable solution for producing a variety of beef, chicken and pork products, both as raw materials and whole cuts.
